questions.question: An old newspaper is an example of what type of informational text?
A car repair manual is an example of what kind of text?
A nonfiction book about whales migration patterns is what kind of informational text?
Which of the following would be a scientific text?

choices.answer: A chapter book about a kitten who paints
A book about how to give your pet cat a bath
A magazine article about saving endangered species of tigers
A folktale about how leopards got their spots

questions.question: Which of the following would be an example of a historical text?

choices.answer: A nonfiction book about the moon's atmosphere
Fictional book about what Neil Armstrong did before liftoff

questions.question: Which of the following might be an example of technical text?

choices.answer: A book about the history of board games
An article claiming school kids should play more games
Newspaper article about kids raising money for recess games
Instructions for how to play Twister

questions.question: Autobiographies, biographies, and diaries are examples of what type of informational text?
Building instructions, how-to books, and car repair manuals are examples of what kind of text?
A book about fossils and a paleontologist's blog about a fossil hunt are what kind of texts?
